name: ANTHOLOGY — The technical bits with Heikki Linnakangas, Robert Aboukhalil & Scott Ford at ATO 2023 (Changelog Interviews #570)
summary: This week we’re taking you to the hallway track of All Things Open 2023 in Raleigh, NC. Today’s episode features: Heikki Linnakangas (Co-founder of Neon and Postgres hacker), Robert Aboukhalil (Bioinformatics software engineer) working on bringing desktop apps to the web with Wasm, and Scott Ford who loves taking a cod...
